title: How to Make Fried Rice with Soy Sauce

steps.headline: Heat the oil in a pan.
steps.description: Just turn on the heat at medium, or right heat just not to burn the rice.

steps.headline: Sautée the garlic.
steps.description: Sauté until it looks golden brown little cubes.

steps.headline: Put on the rice.
steps.description: Mix and mix until the garlic is evenly spread onto the rice.

steps.headline: Add the soy sauce.
steps.description: Mix until the rice has the color of the soy sauce and has a pleasant smell.

steps.headline: Get a small bowl.
steps.description: Put the rice in it, and put pressure on the top of the rice to make it flat. Make sure the rice is leveled with the bowl tip.

steps.headline: Get a plate.
steps.description: Rotate the bowl upside-down and wait until the rice falls out and make the shape out of it.

text: Heat the oil in a pan. Just turn on the heat at medium, or right heat just not to burn the rice. Sautée the garlic. Sauté until it looks golden brown little cubes. Put on the rice. Mix and mix until the garlic is evenly spread onto the rice. Add the soy sauce. Mix until the rice has the color of the soy sauce and has a pleasant smell. Get a small bowl. Put the rice in it, and put pressure on the top of the rice to make it flat. Make sure the rice is leveled with the bowl tip. Get a plate. Rotate the bowl upside-down and wait until the rice falls out and make the shape out of it. Get your favorite Filipino dish (optional).  Serve and eat hot.
sentences: Heat the oil in a pan.
Just turn on the heat at medium, or right heat just not to burn the rice.
Sauté until it looks golden brown little cubes.
Mix and mix until the garlic is evenly spread onto the rice.
Mix until the rice has the color of the soy sauce and has a pleasant smell.
Put the rice in it, and put pressure on the top of the rice to make it flat.
Make sure the rice is leveled with the bowl tip.
Rotate the bowl upside-down and wait until the rice falls out and make the shape out of it.
